certifications.title: Internship completion certificate in Amazon Web Services (Cloud Computing)
Internship completion certificate as Salesforce Developer

projects.name: Doctor Appointment System
projects.description: Developed Doctor on Call, an online service for live video consultations, enabling patients to communicate with doctors in real-time from any location. Implemented features such as secure user authentication, dynamic appointment scheduling, and payment integration. Utilized React, Redux Toolkit, Express.js, Prisma, and PostgreSQL to ensure a seamless user experience.

projects.name: Classroom Allocation to Sections (CSP)
projects.description: Developed a Python-based genetic algorithm using AI to optimize classroom allocation, enhancing uniform utilization, conflict prevention, and resource management in educational settings.

projects.name: Multi-threaded Web Crawler
projects.description: Engineered a high-performance multi-threaded web crawler capable of following and resuming URLs; optimized thread allocation, resulting in a 50 percent increase in data extraction speed.

experiences.description: Demonstrated proficiency in Salesforce fundamentals, process automation, and advanced development practices. Skilled in Apex, testing, debugging, and modernized workflows with VS Code and CLI.

Implemented cloud computing solutions for diverse clients, collaborating with team members to design and deploy robust cloud architectures. Led migrations of on-premises infrastructures to cloud environments, provided technical support and troubleshooting for cloud-based applications, and developed and maintained comprehensive cloud security measures.
